main.name: Ravi Ranjan Jha
main.description: Hi! I'm passionate about crafting interactive, scalable, and high-performance web applications using React, Next.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript. I thrive on turning ideas into reality through clean code and intuitive designs.

work.title: Software Engineer (React.js)

Adopted best practices for clean code and consistent code reviews, contributing to the overall quality and maintainability of the codebase.

work.title: Full Stack Developer

projects.title: Apexload (TMS)
projects.description: Apexloads is a unified logistics platform revolutionizing Africa's transportation industry by integrating multiple functionalities into a single system. It combines a load board, Transportation Management System (TMS), Customer Relationship Manager (CRM), real-time shipment visibility, and invoice factoring services.

projects.title: Water Link (Trading Platform)
projects.description: A trading platform for metal scrap and minerals/ores. It features an admin section with an enquiry module, job section, and shipping module for detailed information about products, jobs, and shipping details.

projects.title: EdMused LMS
projects.description: A comprehensive Learning Management System designed to support dynamic, customizable training solutions. The platform enables the creation of levels, activities, and sub-activities, along with the upload of video content. During video sessions, learners engage with interactive quizzes and assignments, including multiple-choice questions (MCQs), fill-in-the-blanks, and true/false formats. The system also provides an admin panel for managing content and tracking progress, while learners can complete courses, participate in activities, and earn certificates upon successful completion.

projects.title: Bluenudge LMS
projects.description: Developed interactive panels for learners, clients, and coordinators in a Learning Management System, supporting course creation, level management, and user engagement. Enhanced accessibility and user experience using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: Nederland Diagnostics
projects.description: Nederland Diagnostics is a healthcare and diagnostics company focused on providing advanced, affordable diagnostic solutions in the Philippines. The company is known for its state-of-the-art laboratory facilities and efficient IT systems to ensure accurate and timely medical test results for patients and healthcare providers.

projects.title: Eonmed – Digital Healthcare Solution
projects.description: A cutting-edge platform designed to make primary healthcare affordable and accessible for all without compromising quality. Eonmed allows patients to register and log in to consult doctors directly through video calls, facilitating seamless online consultations. The platform offers features such as online fee payments, downloadable prescriptions, and medication recommendations. This system integrates Eonmed’s vision of revolutionizing healthcare by combining traditional physical experiences with modern digital solutions. Leveraging advanced technologies, the platform is supported by a team of expert doctors proficient in addressing both physical ailments and contemporary issues like mental health. Eonmed’s phygital healthcare approach ensures a comprehensive and user-friendly experience, bridging the gap between traditional and digital medical care.
